name: Blessing of Health
effect: Your Constitution score increases by 2, to a maximum of 22.
description: A divine blessing that fortifies the recipient's body, granting exceptional resilience.

name: Blessing of Magic Resistance
effect: You have Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
description: A divine blessing that shields the recipient from harmful magic.

name: Blessing of Protection
effect: You gain a +1 bonus to AC and saving throws.
description: A divine blessing that surrounds the recipient with a subtle protective ward.

name: Blessing of Understanding
effect: Your Wisdom score increases by 2, to a maximum of 22.
description: A divine blessing that grants the recipient exceptional insight and perception.

name: Blessing of Valhalla
effect: You can use a Bonus Action to enter a battle frenzy that lasts 1 minute (as if raging, gaining resistance to Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage). Once used, this blessing can't be used again until you finish a Long Rest.
description: A blessing from warrior deities that grants the recipient a battle frenzy reminiscent of a barbarian's rage.

name: Blessing of Wound Closure
effect: You regain 1 Hit Point at the start of each of your turns if you have at least 1 Hit Point. Additionally, when you roll Hit Point Dice to regain Hit Points, you double the number of Hit Points restored.
description: A divine blessing that causes the recipient's wounds to close rapidly.

name: Charm of Animal Conjuring
effect: You can use an action to cast Conjure Animals (3rd-level version). Once you have used this charm three times, the charm vanishes from you.
description: A temporary supernatural gift that allows the recipient to summon animals.

name: Charm of Darkvision
effect: You can use an action to cast Darkvision, requiring no spell components. Once you have used this charm three times, the charm vanishes from you.
description: A temporary supernatural gift that grants the ability to see in darkness.

name: Charm of Feather Falling
effect: You can cast Feather Fall on yourself, requiring no spell components. Once you have used this charm three times, the charm vanishes from you.
description: A temporary supernatural gift that protects the recipient from falling damage.

name: Charm of Heroism
effect: You can use an action to give yourself the benefit of a Potion of Heroism. The effect lasts 1 hour, granting 10 Temporary Hit Points and the benefit of the Bless spell. Once you have used this charm three times, the charm vanishes from you.
description: A temporary supernatural gift that fills the recipient with extraordinary courage.

name: Charm of Restoration
effect: You can use an action to cast Greater Restoration, requiring no spell components. Once you have used this charm three times, the charm vanishes from you.
description: A temporary supernatural gift that allows the recipient to cure ailments.

name: Charm of the Slayer
effect: One weapon you are holding becomes a magic weapon that grants a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls. Additionally, while holding the weapon, you can use an action to know the exact location of one creature of a specific type (chosen when the charm is bestowed) within 120 feet. The charm lasts 1 hour per use.
description: A temporary supernatural gift that empowers a weapon against a specific foe.

name: Charm of Vitality
effect: You can use an action to regain all your Hit Points and remove all conditions affecting you. Once you have used this charm three times, the charm vanishes from you.
description: A temporary supernatural gift that grants full restoration of health.

name: Charm of Weapon Enhancement
effect: You can use a Bonus Action to transform one weapon you hold into a +1 magic weapon for 1 hour. Once you have used this charm three times, the charm vanishes from you.
description: A temporary supernatural gift that temporarily enhances a weapon.
